channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #53 – Make Rain and Lightning in Corona SDK

item.title: By: Alex
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: Found the answer with the updated library (from its author) at https://github.com/vsergeyev/Rain/tree/master/Rain
item.content:encoded: Found the answer with the updated library (from its author) at https://github.com/vsergeyev/Rain/tree/master/Rain

item.title: By: Alex
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: Did you updated the rain library to be compatible with Graphics 2.0? The current one does not work fine (positioning of the drops do not fill the entire screen - and get even worse when you change the drop angle).
item.content:encoded: Did you updated the rain library to be compatible with Graphics 2.0? The current one does not work fine (positioning of the drops do not fill the entire screen – and get even worse when you change the drop angle).

item.title: By: RichieLoco
item.dc:creator: RichieLoco
item.description:
Enjoyed this!
Keep it up dude :)
Rich
